hero.title: Financial Freedom Through Strategic Patience
hero.subtitle: Discover Dr. Edmund Moore's revolutionary approach: Sometimes doing nothing is the most powerful financial strategy.

philosophy.title: Doing Nothing is an Option
philosophy.subtitle: Dr. Moore's revolutionary philosophy challenges conventional financial wisdom. Learn when strategic inaction is more powerful than constant activity, and how patience can be your greatest financial asset.
philosophy.patienceDesc: Sometimes the most powerful financial move is to wait and observe before acting.
philosophy.decisionsDesc: Make choices based on data and analysis, not emotion or pressure.
philosophy.timeDesc: Compound growth and patience often outperform hasty action.
philosophy.focusDesc: Build wealth through consistent, disciplined strategies over time.
philosophy.quote: In a world obsessed with constant action, the courage to do nothing—strategically—can be your greatest competitive advantage.
philosophy.ctaDesc: Take our Philosophy Assessment Quiz to understand how your current approach aligns with strategic inaction principles and get personalized recommendations.
philosophy.whenToAct: When to Act vs. When to Wait
philosophy.actNowDesc: High-interest debt, emergency fund gaps, time-sensitive opportunities
philosophy.monitorDesc: Market volatility, career transitions, major purchases
philosophy.strategicPatienceDesc: Long-term investments, compound growth, market timing

quiz.title: Philosophy Assessment Quiz
quiz.subtitle: Discover how your financial approach aligns with strategic inaction principles
quiz.question: Question
quiz.resultsSubtitle: Here's what we learned about your financial philosophy
quiz.patienceMasterDesc: You naturally embody Dr. Moore's "Doing Nothing is an Option" philosophy. You understand that patience and strategic inaction are powerful tools in wealth building.
quiz.balancedMakerDesc: You have a good mix of action and patience. You could benefit from learning when strategic inaction provides the greatest advantage.
quiz.actionAchieverDesc: You prefer quick action and decisive moves. While this can be valuable, learning when to embrace strategic patience could significantly improve your financial outcomes.

tools.title: Financial Tools & Resources
tools.subtitle: Access practical financial tools and resources designed by Dr. Edmund Moore to help you build wealth, reduce debt, plan for retirement, and secure your financial future.

netWorth.title: Net Worth Calculator
netWorth.desc: Calculate your net worth by tracking assets and liabilities. Visualize your financial position and track progress over time.

decision.title: Strategic Decision Evaluator
decision.desc: Evaluate whether to act now or embrace strategic patience using Dr. Moore's decision framework.

investment.title: Investment Growth Forecaster
investment.desc: Visualize compound interest and see how patience and consistent contributions build wealth over time.

netWorthCalculator.title: Net Worth Calculator
netWorthCalculator.subtitle: Calculate your net worth by tracking your assets and liabilities. Understanding your financial position is the first step toward strategic wealth building.
netWorthCalculator.ctaTitle: Ready to Build Your Wealth Strategy?
netWorthCalculator.ctaDesc: Understanding your net worth is just the beginning. Explore more tools and learn Dr. Moore's strategic approach to wealth building.

investmentForecaster.title: Investment Growth Forecaster
investmentForecaster.subtitle: Visualize the power of compound interest and strategic patience. See how consistent contributions and time create wealth through the "patience premium."
investmentForecaster.patiencePremiumDesc: This tool demonstrates Dr. Moore's core principle: Strategic patience and consistent action compound over time. The longer you wait, the more your money works for you. Doing nothing (after setting up your plan) is often the optimal strategy.
investmentForecaster.strategicPatienceDesc: This projection demonstrates why "doing nothing" after setting up your investment plan is often the best strategy. Frequent trading, market timing, and emotional decisions typically reduce returns.
investmentForecaster.drMooreAdviceText: Set up automatic contributions, choose diversified investments, and let time and compound interest do the heavy lifting. The patience premium is real.

decisionEvaluator.title: Strategic Decision Evaluator
decisionEvaluator.subtitle: Evaluate whether to act now or embrace strategic patience using Dr. Moore's decision framework
decisionEvaluator.decisionTitlePlaceholder: e.g., Should I buy a new car?
decisionEvaluator.reversibility: How easy is it to reverse this decision?
decisionEvaluator.emotionalPressureDesc: How much emotional pressure do you feel to make this decision?
decisionEvaluator.informationDesc: How much information do you have to make an informed decision?
decisionEvaluator.actNowDesc: This situation calls for decisive action. The factors suggest that waiting could be costly or reduce your options.
decisionEvaluator.strategicPatienceDesc: The optimal strategy is to wait. More time will provide clarity, reduce risk, and potentially improve outcomes.
decisionEvaluator.monitorPrepareDesc: This is a balanced situation. Prepare for action while gathering more information. Set specific triggers for when to act.

bookCompanion.title: Financial Freedom: Doing Nothing is an Option
bookCompanion.subtitle: Enhance your reading experience with interactive tools and resources that bring Dr. Moore's principles to life. Each chapter connects to practical applications you can use immediately.
bookCompanion.aboutDesc1: In a world obsessed with constant action and quick wins, Dr. Edmund Moore presents a revolutionary approach: strategic inaction. This book challenges conventional financial wisdom and demonstrates how patience, observation, and calculated waiting can be your greatest competitive advantages.
bookCompanion.aboutDesc2: Through real-world examples, scientific research, and practical frameworks, you'll learn when to act decisively and when doing nothing is the optimal strategy.
bookCompanion.ctaTitle: Ready to Transform Your Financial Approach?
bookCompanion.ctaDesc: Get the book and access all interactive tools to apply Dr. Moore's strategic inaction philosophy to your financial life.

books.title: Books by Dr. Edmund Moore
books.subtitle: Discover Dr. Moore's collection of books on financial literacy, wealth building, and personal development. Each book provides practical strategies and insights to help you achieve financial freedom.
books.doingNothingDesc: In his latest bestseller, Dr. Moore challenges conventional wisdom by exploring when strategic inaction is the most powerful financial move. Learn how patience, careful observation, and the courage to wait can lead to better financial outcomes than constant activity.

footer.tagline: Empowering financial freedom through strategic patience and informed decision-making.
footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to receive financial insights and updates from Dr. Moore.
